en: Like murky oil, it boils within bellies
Like murky oil, it boils within bellies
Like the boiling of scalding water.
Like the boiling of scalding water.
and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire,
[It will be commanded], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire,

ar: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِ مِنْ عَذَابِ
en: Then pour over his head from the torment
from the torment of scalding water."

ar: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْحَمِيمِ
en: Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water."
[It will be said], "Taste! Indeed, you are the honored, the noble!
